title: HELP RITO
body: Every time i write to one specific friend the chat goes berserk and it doesnt show the messeges. the worst part is that i can't minimize the chat and i cant pick or ban at the champ select

replies.body: We've received a few reports from some players with chat screens failing to collapse during champ select.  In the meantime, let me know if leaving the chat collapsed before accepting queue can help as we investigate this further.
